name: unmelodic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
unpleasant to listen to: There was excessively loud, unmelodic "thrash metal" music blaring from loudspeakers. Unmelodic music was playing from a distant temple.
More examplesFewer examplesThese are unmelodic, frequently message-y songs. This hard, fast and unmelodic "punk" music was said to be the new music of the skinheads. Dating from 1971, the solo sounds every bit its age - experimental, scrupulously unmelodic, slightly arbitrary.
